items.title: Trail hunting to be banned as part of new animal welfare strategy
items.description: The government says the practice is being used as a "smokescreen" for the hunting of wild animals.

items.title: In pictures: Druids descend on Stonehenge to mark winter solstice
items.description: Thousands take to the Neolithic circle to welcome the sunrise on the shortest day of the year.

items.title: Liverpool fear significant lower leg injury for Isak
items.description: Liverpool fear Alexander Isak has sustained a significant lower leg injury after the striker was forced off against Tottenham on Saturday.

items.title: Liverpool fear significant lower leg injury for Isak
items.description: Liverpool fear Alexander Isak has sustained a significant lower leg injury after the striker was forced off against Tottenham on Saturday.

items.title: Israel approves 19 new settlements in occupied West Bank
items.description: Far-right Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich said the move was about blocking the establishment of a Palestinian state.
